attributes.action: Compensate £1 million each remain voter for hardship caused by the brexit
attributes.additional_details:
Evidence: 
Governments Operation Yellowhammer document as of 02 August 2019.
Judgement of the Supreme Court given on 24 September 2019.
attributes.background: The Remain voter have to face difficulty and the life changing circumstances of hardship by the brexit impact. The government Operation Yellowhammer report is the proof that people will be worse of after the brexit. The compensation will help families as they may have to move out of the UK.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to fund. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
